EmailTemplate.subject: HeadStart Late Applications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
HeadStart Late Applications
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in HeadStart London. Unfortunately applications are now closed for 2014. Applications will open again in June 2015 for all 2014 NCS Graduates. Please keep an eye on your emails for further updates or contact us again in Summer 2015. Many thanks HeadStart
